This code chunk is part of the initialization process within the `ShowBase` class in a document that provides an overview of the Panda3D framework's core functionality. It sets up global variables in the `builtins` namespace for essential components such as notification handling, configuration management, and core system access. These assignments facilitate easy access to these critical framework elements throughout the application. The code also includes debug tools for performance profiling when in development mode, enhancing debugging capabilities without impacting release builds.

builtins.ostream = Notify.out()
        builtins.directNotify = directNotify
        builtins.giveNotify = giveNotify
        builtins.globalClock = clock
        builtins.vfs = vfs
        builtins.cpMgr = ConfigPageManager.getGlobalPtr()
        builtins.cvMgr = ConfigVariableManager.getGlobalPtr()
        builtins.pandaSystem = PandaSystem.getGlobalPtr()
        if __debug__:
            builtins.deltaProfiler = DeltaProfiler.DeltaProfiler("ShowBase")
            self.onScreenDebug = OnScreenDebug.OnScreenDebug()
            builtins.onScreenDebug = self.onScreenDebug
